 4 #include "unicode/utypes.h"
 5 
 6 #if !UCONFIG_NO_FORMATTING
 7 #ifndef __NUMBER_LONGNAMES_H__
 8 #define __NUMBER_LONGNAMES_H__
 9 
10 #include "unicode/uversion.h"
11 #include "number_utils.h"
12 #include "number_modifiers.h"
13 
14 U_NAMESPACE_BEGIN namespace number {
15 namespace impl {
16 
17 class LongNameHandler : public MicroPropsGenerator, public ModifierStore, public UMemory {
18   public:
19     static UnicodeString getUnitDisplayName(
20         const Locale& loc,
21         const MeasureUnit& unit,
22         UNumberUnitWidth width,
23         UErrorCode& status);
24 
25     static LongNameHandler*
26     forCurrencyLongNames(const Locale &loc, const CurrencyUnit &currency, const PluralRules *rules,
27                          const MicroPropsGenerator *parent, UErrorCode &status);
28 
29     static LongNameHandler*
30     forMeasureUnit(const Locale &loc, const MeasureUnit &unit, const MeasureUnit &perUnit,
31                    const UNumberUnitWidth &width, const PluralRules *rules,
32                    const MicroPropsGenerator *parent, UErrorCode &status);
33 
34     void
35     processQuantity(DecimalQuantity &quantity, MicroProps &micros, UErrorCode &status) const U_OVERRIDE;
36 
37     const Modifier* getModifier(int8_t signum, StandardPlural::Form plural) const U_OVERRIDE;
38 
39   private:
40     SimpleModifier fModifiers[StandardPlural::Form::COUNT];
41     const PluralRules *rules;
42     const MicroPropsGenerator *parent;
43 
44     LongNameHandler(const PluralRules *rules, const MicroPropsGenerator *parent)
45             : rules(rules), parent(parent) {}
46 
47     static LongNameHandler*
48     forCompoundUnit(const Locale &loc, const MeasureUnit &unit, const MeasureUnit &perUnit,
49                     const UNumberUnitWidth &width, const PluralRules *rules,
50                     const MicroPropsGenerator *parent, UErrorCode &status);
51 
52     void simpleFormatsToModifiers(const UnicodeString *simpleFormats, Field field, UErrorCode &status);
53     void multiSimpleFormatsToModifiers(const UnicodeString *leadFormats, UnicodeString trailFormat,
54                                        Field field, UErrorCode &status);
55 };
56 
57 }  // namespace impl
58 }  // namespace number
59 U_NAMESPACE_END
60 
61 #endif //__NUMBER_LONGNAMES_H__
62 
63 #endif /* #if !UCONFIG_NO_FORMATTING */
